topics.body: I remember in highschool we use to have to pick up kids/drop them off at a near middle school on our. So one day picking up people at middle school, my friends and I opened our windows and there was a redneck near our bus (I think... I live in the foothills of the Appalachian mountains in Georgia) and shouted in a southern accent "THE SOUTH WILL RISE AGAIN" best reactions ever (no we're not racists etc. just people who do stupid things)
